message.entry: Input must be an Expression, or a double, single or logical array which must not be sparse or complex.
Input must be a numeric or logical array which must not be sparse or complex.
First input must be a character vector or a scalar string.
Input {0} is not a valid variable name.
Size inputs must be integers or a row vector of integers.
Input must be a numeric array, or a character vector or a scalar string.
Saving an Expression is not supported.
Loading an Expression is not supported.
First input must be a character vector and second input must be a size row vector.
